docs.snippet: The old-fashioned musical triumphed, and there was joy through the land — "La La Land," that is. Though Damien Chazelle's candy-colored musical cleaned up at the Golden Globes, there was a more serious undertone to the evening, with referenc...
docs.lead_paragraph: The old-fashioned musical triumphed, and there was joy through the land — "La La Land," that is. Though Damien Chazelle's candy-colored musical cleaned up at the Golden Globes, there was a more serious undertone to the evening, with references both humorous and not to the impending Donald Trump era. There was also a bang-up opening musical number and one of the cutest child actors ever to grace an awards stage. Here are some key moments of the evening:

headline.main: Golden Globes Serve Up a Side Order of Politics
headline.print_headline: Golden Globes Serve Up a Side Order of Politics

docs.snippet: For almost eight years, the members of the Congressional Black Caucus existed in the shadow of the first black president. They praised President Barack Obama's achievements while at the same time pushing him to do more for their constituents who o...
docs.lead_paragraph: For almost eight years, the members of the Congressional Black Caucus existed in the shadow of the first black president. They praised President Barack Obama's achievements while at the same time pushing him to do more for their constituents who overwhelmingly supported his history-making campaign and administration.

headline.main: Trump's Election Energizes Congressional Black Caucus
headline.print_headline: Trump's Election Energizes Congressional Black Caucus
